name: Epic Megajam - Down To Earth Royale
name_original: Epic Megajam - Down To Earth Royale
description:
Our entry to the Epic Megajam 2019. Competing in "Friends and Foes" and "Tiny".

This is a multiplayer game.

 When connecting from the clients write the server's ip:port for example 109.109.109.109:7777

When all players have connected and press Ready the game begins, the goal is to land on an landing pad before the other players. The player that is last gets eliminated.

Turn the rocket using A, D 

Accelerate using W 

Unpack the zip on your harddrive, run DownToEarthRoyale to start.

Server needs to have port 7777 open. Which means if your behind a router you need to port forward to the computer that is server.
